title: 88/120/EEC: Commission Decision of 13 January 1988 approving the fifth amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classical swine fever, submitted by Italy (Only the Italian text is authentic)
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 13 January 1988
approving the fifth amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradication of classifal swine fever, submitted by Italy
(Only the Italian text is authentic)
(88/120/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The fifth amendment to the plan for the accelerated eradictation of classical swine fever, submitted by Italy, is hereby approved.
The amendment to the plan, referred to in Article 1, shall take effect on 1 January 1988.
This Decision is addressed to the Italian Republic.
